title: Exploring the Impact of Digital Ads and Social Media on Purchasing Decisions
text:
Introduction ‚Äì Why This Survey?
üìå Understanding digital consumer behavior
The way people discover and purchase products has evolved. Social media and digital ads play a crucial role in shaping decisions. This survey helps analyze trends to improve marketing strategies.

title: Exploring the Impact of Digital Ads and Social Media on Purchasing Decisions
section: The Role of Social Media in Product Discovery
text:
The Role of Social Media in Product Discovery
üìå Why is this important?
Consumers are influenced by what they see online. Some platforms work better for certain industries (e.g., TikTok for beauty, LinkedIn for B2B).

title: Exploring the Impact of Digital Ads and Social Media on Purchasing Decisions
text:
Digital Ads & Purchasing Behavior
üìå Why are ads effective?
Different people respond to different ad formats. Understanding what type of content drives conversions.

title: Exploring the Impact of Digital Ads and Social Media on Purchasing Decisions
text:
The Importance of Brand Trust
üìå Why does trust matter? People are more likely to buy from brands they trust. Reviews, transparency, and social proof influence purchasing.

title: Exploring the Impact of Digital Ads and Social Media on Purchasing Decisions
text:
Device Preferences in Online Shopping
üìå Why does it matter? Knowing which devices people use helps optimize digital strategies. Mobile-first marketing vs.¬†desktop-focused advertising.

title: Exploring the Impact of Digital Ads and Social Media on Purchasing Decisions
text:
Conclusion ‚Äì Why This Survey Matters
üìå Final Thoughts Helps brands make smarter marketing decisions Identifies consumer preferences and ad effectiveness Provides valuable insights into digital shopping behavior

title: Exploring the Impact of Digital Ads and Social Media on Purchasing Decisions
text:
How this helps:
Businesses optimize advertising budgets. Marketers tailor strategies to meet audience expectations. Consumers receive more relevant and engaging content.

title: EXPERIENCE
text:
I am a motivated and detail-oriented marketing enthusiast with a strong background in management, specializing in entrepreneurship and innovation. Currently pursuing an MSc in Experiential Digital Marketing Communications, I am passionate about combining creativity with strategic thinking to drive impactful marketing campaigns.
With hands-on experience in corporate administration, client relationship management, and strategic product placement, I excel at project coordination, regulatory compliance, and enhancing customer engagement. My professional journey has equipped me with strong communication, organizational, and analytical skills, allowing me to navigate complex business environments effectively.
I am always eager to learn, stay ahead of digital marketing trends, and contribute to innovative marketing strategies. Fluent in Greek and English, with foundational knowledge in Spanish and Italian, I thrive in multicultural settings and collaborative environments.
I am particularly interested in brand storytelling, experiential marketing, and data-driven decision-making to create meaningful consumer experiences.
Let‚Äôs connect and discuss insights on marketing, entrepreneurship, and career growth! üöÄ

title: about me
text:
About Me & Why I‚Äôm Conducting This Survey
Hi! My name is Evanthia, and I am currently pursuing an MSc in Experiential Digital Marketing Communications. As someone passionate about understanding digital consumer behavior and marketing trends, I am conducting this survey to explore how people interact with digital ads, discover products online, and make purchasing decisions.
Your feedback will provide valuable insights into the role of social media, advertising, and brand trust in shaping consumer choices. The results will help analyze which marketing strategies are the most effective and how brands can enhance their online presence.
Your time and honest responses are greatly appreciated‚Äîthank you for participating! üòä

title: Course overview
text:
What is a Dashboard?

Dashboards provide a visual display of the most important information needed to achieve one or more objectives.
They consolidate and arrange information on a single screen.

Key Characteristics of Effective Dashboards

Clarity: Information should be easy to read and interpret.
Accuracy: Data must be accurate and up-to-date.
Relevance: Content should align with user goals and needs.

title: Course overview
text: Definition by Stephen Few

title: Course overview
text:
The Role of Visual Design

Minimize distractions and unnecessary elements.
Use consistent layouts and formatting.
Apply thoughtful use of color and typography.

Best Practices for Dashboard Design

Avoid clutter: Only display essential information.
Prioritize data: Highlight key metrics and KPIs.
Use visual hierarchy: Direct the viewer‚Äôs focus to the most important elements.

title: Course overview
text:
Common Pitfalls to Avoid

Overloading the user with too much data.
Using overly complex or inconsistent designs.
Neglecting the importance of user testing.

What You Shoud Do

Focus on the needs and goals of the dashboard‚Äôs end-users.
Iteratively test and refine designs to improve usability.

title: Course overview
text:
Summary

Dashboards are powerful tools for decision-making.
Effective dashboards balance clarity, relevance, and visual appeal.
Avoid common pitfalls by focusing on user needs and testing designs.
